name: Lost Kart
description:
Lost Kart is all about reactions. You play as a lost hover kart. The ideas simple and there isn't much to take in, you just drive around an infinite world without crashing! We are open to any kind of feedback! Keep in mind this is a simple and short game, so don't expect much.

Controls:

Move- WASD

Camera-Mouse

Hop-Space

Speed up- Left Shift

Quit- Alt+F4
